summary.description:
Point-group symmetry detection in three-dimensional charge density of biomolecules.

A new repository(with deleted history) in preparation for release 3.0 of SIMPLE.

_______ _____ _______ _____ _______.

The Simple GUI is designed to have a single instance of the server running on an accessible node, to which multiple users can connect using individual or shared login credentials.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'cryo-EM', 'IMPLEMENTATION:The', 'point-group', 'point-group symmetry'
summary.name: SIMPLE3.0
